articles.author: Richard Connor
articles.title: India brushes off Trump tariff threat over Russian oil - DW
articles.description: India has pushed back against US President Donald Trump's threat to impose higher tariffs on Indian goods. New Delhi condemned Western criticism of its buying oil from Moscow, vowing to protect its national interests.
articles.content:
India on Monday denounced as unfair the mounting pressure from the United States and European Union over its continued purchases of Russian oil.
